summary:
It’s a nice living place with an an office, library, mage corner with an scripted ingredient sorter, scripted training arena, scripted archery range, display room, forge, alchemical garden, stables for dog & horse.

Perfect for mages, monks, druids, hunters or all other peace seeking peoples.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26043-5-1351455755.png[/img]

[font=Georgia][color=#ccc][size=7][b]The Monastery of Eru[/b][/size]

[size=5][b]It’s a nice living place with:[/b][/size] 

 	[list]
[*]an office, 
[*]library, 
[*]mage corner with an scripted ingredient sorter, 
[*]scripted training arena, 
[*]scripted archery range, 
[*]display room, 
[*]forge, 
[*]alchemical garden, 
[*]stables for dog & horse.
[/list]


[size=5][b]Why di you call it monastery?[/b][/size]
Because it’s a really quite place with a great view. Perfect for mages, monks, druids, hunters or all other peace seeking peoples.


[size=5][b]Location:[/b][/size]
The monastery can be found near Nilheim [i](That\'s when you go to Riften)[/i]. 


[size=5][b]Quest, items or something else?[/b][/size]
There is no new Quest, only a few training npc\'s and i hope no dirty references [i](i didn’t see some, that’s why i think there aren’t any left)[/i]. If you see some, you can still contact me and i will see what i can do. The same for spelling errors.


[size=5][b]Compatibility:[/b][/size]
It should be compatible with other mods. Only if you have a mod that alters the region around Nilheim, there could be some problems. 


[size=5][b]Credits/Thanks to:[/b][/size]
For some scripts: WillieSea & B1gBadDaddy


[b]There are no new items or cheating elements! 
The containers should not respawn! I have tried the mod several days and there where no problems, but make still a save bofore using any mod.[/b]


[size=5][b]If you like it:[/b][/size]
a comment would be nice[/color][/font]
author: Erua
